pkmkdoc.description:
Growl is a centralized notification system for OS X.
It allows compatible applications to provide you with information in an attractive and customizable way without you having to switch away from what you are currently doing.
See http://growl.info/about.php for more information.

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf929 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Welcome to Growl! \ \ Growl is a centralized notification system for OS X. \ \ It allows applications that support it to provide you with information in an attractive and customizable way without you having to switch away from what you are currently doing.\ \ Some applications can have Growl support added using plugins or 'extras'. You can find extras for Safari, Apple Mail, and more in the Extras folder which came with this installer.\ \ See http://growl.info/about.php for more information.\ \ Click Continue to install.\ \ On Mac OS X 10.5 and above, you will be given the choice of installation for all users or just for you. On Mac OS X 10.4, Growl will be installed to /Library/PreferencePanes/Growl.prefPane and available for all users.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf929 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf929 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Bem vindos ao Growl! \ \ O Growl \'e9 um sistema de notifica\'e7\'f5es centralizadas para o OS X. \ \ Sendo assim, os aplicativos passam a poder lhe enviar informa\'e7\'f5es de uma forma atrativa e tamb\'e9m customizada, e isso tudo sem que voc\'ea tenha que parar de fazer aquilo que est\'e1 fazendo no atual momento.\ \ Alguns aplicativos tem suporte ao Growl atrav\'e9s do uso de extens\'f5es ou 'extras'. Voc\'ea pode encontrar extras para o Safari, Mail da Apple, e muitos outros na pasta Extras desse instalador.\ \ Para maiores informa\'e7\'f5es, veja a p\'e1gina http://growl.info/about.php (em ingl\'eas)\ \ Clique em Continuar para iniciar a instala\'e7\'e3o. \ \ NoMac OS X 10.5 ou vers\'e3o mais recente, voc\'ea vai ter a op\'e7\'e3o de escolher a instala\'e7\'e3o para todos os usu\'e1rios ou apenas para voc\'ea. J\'e1 no Mac OS X 10.4, o Growl ser\'e1 instalado em /Library/PreferencePanes/Growl.prefPane e estar\'e1 dispon\'edvel para todos os usu\'e1rios.}
